welcome:
💠 *Welcome to the TelegramEDT bot !* 💠
🔹Please use the command /setedt to set your calendar
🔹Use /notif to configure events notification
ℹAnd /help for more commands
help:
ℹ *Commands help* ℹ
📅/edt, show your next events
🔔/notif, set your events notifications
⚙/setedt, set your calendar
edt_err_set:
Your EDT is not set ! ❌
ℹUse /setedt to fix that
edt_err_choice:
Invalid choice ! ❌
ℹYou can choose between: `day`, `next`, `week`, `next week`
notif_help:
ℹ *Notif help* ℹ
🔹`toggle` to switch on/off notifications
🔹`time` to set time in minutes between notification and event
🔹`cooldown` set time in minutes between notification
notif_err_act:
Invalid action ! ❌
ℹUse /notif to see help
